result.eng: The death penalty was abolished in 1976.
result.ga: Ba sa bhliain 1976 a cuireadh pionós an bháis ar ceal
result.orig: Ba sa bhliain 1976 a cuireadh pionós an bháis ar ceal
result.html: Ba sa bhliain 1976 a cuireadh pionós an bháis ar cealThe death penalty was abolished in 1976.
result.ponchtml: Ba sa ḃliain 1976 a cuireaḋ pionós an ḃáis ar cealThe death penalty was abolished in 1976.

result.eng: The problem was growing from year to year.

result.eng: They were still working at this time last year.

result.eng: The project was finished at long last in 2004.

result.eng: After he had ben living in Germany for two years, his German improved a lot.
result.ga: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ghearmáin ar feadh dhá bhliain tháinig feabhas mór ar a chuid Gearmáinise
result.orig: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ghearmáin ar feadh dhá bhliain tháinig feabhas mór ar a chuid Gearmáinise

result.eng: Although he had been living in Germany for two years, his German did not improve at all.
